infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: We need access to speech recognition to transcribe your voice input for the AI meal estimator
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Macro Goal needs access to your photo library to let you select progress photos for your weight check-ins. For example, you can choose a photo from your gallery to track your body transformation over time alongside your weight measurements.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Macro Goal to access your camera for barcode scanning

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Macro Goal to access your microphone for voice input

plugins.photosPermission: Macro Goal needs access to your photo library to let you select progress photos for your weight check-ins. For example, you can choose a photo from your gallery to track your body transformation over time alongside your weight measurements.
